migrations.description: Updates the Angular CDK to v18
migrations.name: migration-v18

migrations.description: Migrate application projects to the new build system. Application projects that are using the '@angular-devkit/build-angular' package's 'browser' and/or 'browser-esbuild' builders will be migrated to use the new 'application' builder. You can read more about this, including known issues and limitations, here: https://angular.dev/tools/cli/build-system-migration
migrations.name: use-application-builder

migrations.description: Updates two-way bindings that have an invalid expression to use the longform expression instead.
migrations.name: invalid-two-way-bindings

migrations.description: Replace deprecated HTTP related modules with provider functions
migrations.name: migration-http-providers

migrations.description: Updates calls to afterRender with an explicit phase to the new API
migrations.name: migration-after-render-phase
